page.title: 18Famous Orchestral Conductor.
page.content: Mr.Handley is a famous orchestral conductor with The London Philharmonic Orchestra. He lives in a small village in the Wye Valley called Pen-y-Van.It is very easy to get to other parts of the country and airports from there.He became a conductor while studying at Oxford University. He had learned conducting technique at 16 years of age. The orchestras with which Mr.Handley is involved are The London Philharmonic Orchestra, Scottish Symphony Orchestra, Ulster Symphony Orchestra and the Malmo Orchestra in Sweden. Many hours of study and preparation are needed before a performance. Some of the places Mr. Handley has visited are Holland, France and Australia. His favourite concert hall is The Royal Festival Hall, London.
